about-description#paragraph3: I’m a programmer, 23 years old, living in Argentina
about-description#paragraph4: Ever since I was young, I’ve been fascinated by the world of computers and technology. Currently, I’m a university student pursuing a degree in Computer Science.
about-description#paragraph5: In 2019, I began self-studying web development, learning the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Today, I possess a strong command of an extensive stack of frameworks and packages, enabling me to apply them effectively in both frontend and backend projects. Below, you will find some of the projects I have done to put into practice and improve my skills.
about-description#paragraph6: If you have a project in mind and believe that I have the necessary capabilities, please do not hesitate to get in touch!
about-description#paragraph7: Thank you for visiting my portfolio, and I hope you enjoy exploring my projects!
